name: Handmade Plush Pony Inspired by Apple Jack-Holiday Version
description:
Just in time for the Holidays!
This is a hand made, fan made plush of the My Little Pony character Apple Jack, I am not associated with Hasbro in any way. 
This version of her has a holiday twist.
She is made from high quality incredibly soft and luxurious mango colored minky fabric. She stands 13 inches long from the tip of her nose to the tip of her tail, and 12 inches tall at the highest point of her hat. Her hair mane and tail are made from soft light yellow minky fabric and have red satin bows for tie accents. Her santa hat is made from soft red minky fabric with a white pom pom hand sewn onto the end and white faux fur trim, Hat is hand sewn into place. She has a removable red minky fabric scarf with white pom poms hand sewn onto the ends. 
She is tightly stuffed with hypo-allergenic polyester fiber fill and stands free on her own without any wires or cages. The bottom of her feet have been filled with polyester plastic pellets for extra added weight and to help her stand. 
Her eyes, freckles and cutie marks have been beautifully machine embroidered to last a lifetime, her eyes and cutie marks will NEVER fall off or flake over time. She has cutie marks embroidered on both of her thighs. Her embroidered parts have been coated with a special clear glue in order to prevent any snagging of the threads.
She is mostly machine sewn, but her mane, tail, head, and hat have been sewn by hand, due to hand sewn elements she is not recommended for small children or rough play, but gentle cuddling is fine ^_^ 
Spot clean only. Do NOT machine wash, do NOT put in dryer. 
Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment from all new materials.
Holiday tree not included.

name: Custom Original Handmade TO ORDER Plush Pony
description:
This listing is for one (1) custom, one of a kind, handmade plush pony. Your pony has not been made yet. I will work with you to bring your own custom character to life. It is preferred that you have some type of drawn or computerized image of what your desired character will look like. Please e-mail conceited.plastic@hotmail.com with your idea before placing an order. Your pony will be finished within 2-6 weeks of payment being received.
All custom ponies are made from soft and luxurious minky fabric.
Choose from a female or male head. Earth pony, unicorn, Pegasus, or alicorn body type.
Your pony will have its own one of a kind machine embroidered cutie mark chosen by you. Cutie marks will be embroidered onto both sides of pony. It can be an image, word, or phrase. I have some designs to chose from or I can digitize any jpeg images into embroidered images on fabric.
Your pony will have machine embroidered eyes. 
Choose from many eyes in stock or send me a jpeg image of an eye you desire, and I will embroider your design onto the pony for you. Your pony can also have freckles, moles, scars, or other small embroidered face details.
Your pony will have a customized mane and tail to match your liking.
Your pony will be tightly stuffed with hypoallergenic stuffing and will have polyester plastic pellets in the bottom of their feet for added weight.
Custom ponies stand 12 inches tall WITHOUT mane and 12 inches long WITHOUT tail. The average finished height of a custom pony is 13 inches tall with mane, 16 inches long with tail.
Your pony may come with one free plastic pony bead name tag if desired.
Custom accessories are available for additional costs. Accessories may include; pony fluffy legwarmers, wide legged pony pants with decorative chain, pony tutu, pony headphones, pierced ears, bandanna, etc.
All custom ponies are handmade in Seattle Washington.

name: Handmade TO ORDER Fan Made Plush Inspired by Firefly
description:
This is a hand made, fan made plush of the My Little Pony Pegasus Firefly, I am not associated with Hasbro in any way. This is a G1 pony made into G4 style. She has NOT been made yet, once your order is placed you will receive her in 4-6 weeks of payment. She will look identical to the pictures posted. Since each plushie is hand made, there will be slight variations between each plushie. 
She is made from high quality incredibly soft and luxurious light pink minky fabric. She stands 13 inches long from the tip of her nose to the tip of her tail, and 12 inches tall at the highest point of her mane. Her hair mane and tail are made from soft  blue minky fabric with machine stitched details. 
She is tightly stuffed with hypo-allergenic polyester fiber fill and stands free on her own without any wires or cages. The bottom of her feet have been filled with polyester plastic pellets for extra added weight and to help her stand. 
Her eyes and cutie marks have been beautifully machine embroidered to last a lifetime, her eyes and cutie marks will NEVER fall off or flake over time. She has cutie marks embroidered on both of her thighs. 
She is mostly machine sewn, but her mane, open wings, and head have been sewn by hand, due to hand sewn elements she is not recommended for small children or rough play, but gentle cuddling is fine ^_^ 
Spot clean only. Do NOT machine wash, do NOT put in dryer. 
Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment from all new materials

name: Panda Spirit Hood-MADE TO ORDER
description:
MADE TO ORDER. This hood has NOT been made yet, once your order is placed, you will receive it within 4-6 weeks. It will look identical to the hood pictured.
White soft and cuddly anti-pill polar fleece has been cut and sewn to make this panda spirit hood. Hood features black fleece ears that have been sewn into fitted side seams. Large blue acrylic plastic eyes and tiny plastic nose bring life to the hood. Eyes have been detailed with black felt eyeliner that have been machine appliqued into place so they will never fall off. 
Long fleece scarves extend from hood meeting up with mitten shaped pockets, great to keep your hands warm or to carry water bottles, cell phones, and other small items.
Hood has been fully lined with black anti-pill polar fleece.
Handmade in Seattle Washington from all new materials in a smoke free environment.

name: Medium Length White Tutu with Satin Trim
description:
25 yards of white bridal tulle has been gathered and stitched into 2 layers to create this full, fun and bouncy white tutu! Layers of tulle have been serged/overlocked to a white cotton waistband to last a lifetime. Non-roll elastic has been encased inside the waistband so this tutu will NEVER stretch out over time. 25 yards of white satin ribbon have been perfectly stitched on to the edge of the tulle for a unique finish. 
Gathered waistband will allow this tutu to stretch from 27-45 inches in circumference. Skirt has a finished length of 10 inches. 
Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment. All seams have been machine sewn, there are no hand sewn elements.

name: White Sparkle Legwarmers-MADE TO ORDER
description:
These legwarmers have NOT been made yet, once your order is placed, you will receive them within 4-6 weeks.
Super soft high quality long haired white sparkle faux fur has been cut and sewn to create these dazzling legwarmers! Legwarmers have a strong 1 1/2 inch knit elastic band stitched around the top. Elastic band has been covered with a white stretch lycra for extreme comfort. This unique design of TWO types of elastic will ensure that your legwarmers will NEVER fall down or stretch out over time. These fluffies will fit around calves 12-18 inches in circumference. Legwarmers have a finished length of 18 inches and feature a straight legged design. Inside seams have been trimmed but these fluffies are not lined. All seams have been machine sewn, there are NO hand sewn elements. Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment,

name: Short White Sparkle Tutu with Ribbon Trim
description:
25 yards of white sparkle dot tulle has been gathered and stitched into 2 layers to create this full, fun and bouncy sparkle tutu! Layers of tulle have been serged/overlocked to a white cotton waistband to last a lifetime. Non-roll elastic has been encased inside the waistband so this tutu will NEVER stretch out over time. 25 yards of white satin ribbon have been perfectly stitched on to the edge of the tulle for a unique finish. 
Gathered waistband will allow this tutu to stretch from 27-45 inches in circumference. Skirt has a finished length of approximately 7 inches. 
Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment.

name: Black and Red Spiked Fluffies
description: Super soft long haired 3 toned black red and brown spiked faux fur has been cut and sewn to create these fluffies. Fluffies have a large flared hem circumference of 27 inches. A strong 2 inch black knit elastic band has been sewn to the tops of legwarmers to ensure they will NEVER stretch out or fall down over time. Fluffies have a finished length of 19 inches. Inside seams have been trimmed. These fluffies are not lined like our previous collection of legwarmers. All seams have been machine sewn, there are NO hand sewn elements to these legwarmers. Hand wash cold, line dry. Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment.

name: Black and Red Spiked Gathered Fur Skirt
description: Yards of tightly gathered super soft black stretch lycra have been attached to a black stretch lycra waistband. Non-roll elastic has been encased inside the waistband so this skirt will NEVER stretch out or fall down over time. Yards of super soft high quality black and red with a hint of brown spiked faux fur have been sewn onto the hem of the gathered tier of black lycra, giving the fur a unique gathered look. All inside lycra seams have been serged/overlocked for a clean finish and to allow the skirt to stretch and move in all the right places. Skirt is super bouncy and full of movement while walking and dancing. Skirt will fit waist 34-42 inches in circumference. Skirt has a finished length of 10 inches. Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment.

name: Green Black Light Reflective Tutu
description:
Just in time for Halloween! 25 yards of white bridal tulle has been gathered and stitched into 4 layers to create this full, fun and bouncy tutu! Layers of tulle have been serged/overlocked to a white stretch lycra waistband to last a lifetime. Tutu features our new smooth waistband. Non-roll elastic has been encased inside the waistband so this tutu will NEVER stretch out over time. 25 yards of neon black light reflective green ribbon has perfectly stitched onto the edges of all 4 layers of tulle for a fun unique look, that looks AMAZING under a black light. Great for Halloween costumes, Raves, outdoor festivals, and other fun events. 
This tutus stretchy waistband will fit waist 27-36 inches in circumference. Skirt has a finished length of 10 inches. 
Handmade in Seattle Washington.

name: Lavender Sparkle Cat Scoodie
description: Super soft and luxurious lavender shag fur has been cut and sewn to create this spectacular cat scoodie! Hood features large pointy cat shaped ears that have been lined with blue sequin sparkle fabric, ears have been securely sewn into side seams . Long fur pieces run down arms attached to mitten shaped pockets. Pockets have been lined with corresponding sparkle fabric. Pockets measure 6 inches wide by 7 inches tall. This scoodie is fully lined with incredibly sparkly blue sequin plush fur fabric. All seams have been machine sewn, there are NO hand sewn elements. Hood is one size fits most teen/adult. Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment. This listing is for the hood/scoodie ONLY (tutu and top not included)

name: Rainbow Fur Hat-MADE TO ORDER
description:
MADE TO ORDER; this hat has NOT been made yet, once your order is placed you will receive the hat within 4-6 weeks. It will look identical to the hat pictured.
Super soft long haired rainbow shag fur. 
One size fits all.
Large round ears-lined with fleece 
Long black strings with fuzzy pom poms.
Fully lined with black cotton.
Completely machine sewn.
Handmade in Seattle, Washington.

name: Horizontal Striped Rainbow Fluffies-MADE TO ORDER
description:
These fluffies have NOT been made yet, once your order is placed you will receive them within 4 weeks. Please choose black or white elastic when ordering.
Super soft high quality long haired rainbow shag fur featuring yellow,green,blue,purple,and pink, has been used to make these beautiful horizontal striped rainbow fluffies. Fluffies fit legs 12-19 inches in circumference. 
Fluffies have a finished length of 18 inches. 
Hem of each legwarmer measures 19 inches in circumference. 
Tops of fluffies have a strong 1 1/2 inch tall knit elastic band, band is covered with white or black (your choice) stretch lycra for extreme comfort.
These fluffies will NEVER fall down or stretch out over time. 
Inside of legwarmers have been trimmed.
Handmade in Seattle Washington.

name: Vertical Rainbow Striped Fluffies-MADE TO ORDER
description:
These fluffies have NOT been made yet, once your order is placed you will receive them within 4 weeks. Please choose black (not pictured) or white elastic when ordering.
Super soft high quality long haired rainbow shag fur featuring yellow,green,blue,purple,and pink, has been used to make these beautiful vertical striped rainbow fluffies. Fluffies fit legs  11-19 inches in circumference. Fluffies have a finished length of 18 inches. Hem of each legwarmer measures 19 inches in circumference. Tops of fluffies have a strong 1 1/2 inch tall knit elastic band, band is covered with white stretch lycra for extreme comfort. These fluffies will NEVER fall down or stretch out over time. 
Inside of legwarmers have been trimmed, but they are not lined like our previous collections. Handmade in Seattle Washington.

name: Handmade Fan Made Plush Inspired by BMO
description:
This listing is for 1 hand made fan made plushie inspired by the character BMO from Adventure Time. 
He is made from super soft teal colored minky fabric. His face details, buttons, eyes, mouth, name, and speaker holes have all been completely machine embroidered with multiple thread colors, from my own digitized pattern. All details will NEVER fall off or flake over time. He is completely machine sewn, except his arms have been sewn on by hand. He sits 5 inches tall by 3 inches wide, a standard 12oz size coffee mug has been used as a size comparison (coffee mug not included). He has been tightly stuffed with non hyper-allergenic polyester fiber fill.
Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment.

name: Hot pink and sky blue gathered fur skirt
description:
Yards of tightly gathered hot pink stretch lycra have been attached to a hot pink stretch lycra waistband. Non-roll elastic has been encased inside the waistband so this skirt will NEVER stretch out or fall down over time. Yards of super soft high quality sky blue faux fur have been sewn onto the hem of the gathered tier of hot pink lycra, giving the fur a unique gathered look. All inside lycra seams have been serged/overlocked for a clean finished and to allow the skirt to stretch and move in all the right places. Skirt will fit waist 30-38 inches in circumference. Skirt has a finished length of 10 inches.
We can also do custom color combinations if interested. Please click the "contact" button in the lower right hand corner to place a custom order.

name: Green and purple gathered fur skirt
description: Yards of tightly gathered purple stretch lycra have been attached to a purple stretch lycra waistband. Non-roll elastic has been encased inside the waistband so this skirt will NEVER stretch out or fall down over time. Yards of super soft high quality lime green crinkled faux fur have been sewn onto the hem of the gathered tier of purple lycra, giving the fur a unique gathered look. All inside lycra seams have been serged/overlocked for a clean finished and to allow the skirt to stretch and move in all the right places. Skirt will fit waist 34-42 inches in circumference. Skirt has a finished length of 10 inches.

name: Bright Green with Fuchsia Trim Children's Pettiskirt
description: Two tiers of super soft and bouncy bright green nylon chiffon tricot have been gathered and stitched to green polyester satin waistband. This skirt has two layers of two tiered chiffon. Yards and yards of ruffled fuchsia chiffon have been stitched onto the hem of both skirt layers. Skirt is incredibly full and bouncy. Non-roll elastic has been encased inside green satin waistband to fit various sizes. Skirt will fit waist 17-26 inches in circumference. Skirt has a finished length of 10 inches. This listing is for skirt only, tank top is NOT included. Handmade in Seattle Washington.

name: Bright Green Children's Chiffon Tutu with Blue Trim
description:
12 yards of super soft and bouncy bright green nylon chiffon tricot have been gathered and stitched to green polyester waistband. This skirt consists of two layers of chiffon. Yards and yards of blue ruffled chiffon has been stitched onto the hem of the skirt. This skit will bounce and twirl while worn, she will never want to take it off!
Non-roll elastic has been encased inside of the green satin waistband to allow this skirt to fit various waist sizes. Skirt will fit waist 17-26 inches. Skirt has a finished length of 9 inches. This listing is for the skirt only, tank top is NOT included. Handmade in Seattle Washington.

name: White Sparkle Lined Hat
description: Super soft long haired white faux fur has been cut and sewn to create this cozy hat. Hat is a closely fitted one size fits all design. Rounded ears have been sewn into the fitted side seams for an adorable detail. Insides of ears are detailed with bright sparkle sequin plush fur! Long strings with fuzzy pom poms on the ends, can be tied for extreme cold weather. Hat is lined with a corresponded colored bright sequin sparkle lining! Super warm, cuddly, and sparkly!

name: Three tone fading fluffies-Pink
description: White, Light pink, and Hot Pink super soft high quality faux fur have been cut and sewn to create these beautiful fading fluffies. Fluffies have a large hem circumference of 26 inches. Legwarmers have a finished length of 18 inches. A strong 1 1/2 inch elastic band has been sewn to the top. Elastic band has been covered in stretch lycra for extreme comfort. These fluffies will NEVER fall down or stretch out over time.

name: Long Rainbow Tutu
description: 28 yards of red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, and pink bridal tulle have been gathered together in vertical stripes. Tulle has been stitched and serged to black cotton waistband to last a lifetime. Non-roll elastic has been encased in cotton waistband to allow fitting to various sizes. This tutus stretchy waistband will fit waists 30-46 inches. Tutu has a finished length of 13 inches.Although tutu is very full, it still may appear sheer. It is recommended the proper undergarments be worn with this skirt. Custom tutus may be ordered upon request.

name: Handmade Fan Made Plush Inspired by Sylveon
description:
This is a hand made fan made plushie inspired by the Pokemon, Sylveon, I am not associated with Nintendo/Pokemon in any way. I purchased the sewing pattern on Etsy.com shop site 'dolphinwing'. 
She is made from super soft luxurious minky fabric. She has been tightly stuffed with non hyper-allergenic polyester fiber fill. She stands 13 inches tall including ears and 7.5 inches long from nose to tail. The bottom of her feet are filled with plastic pellets to help her stand. Her eyes have been completely machine embroidered from my own digitized pattern. Eyes will NEVER fall off or flake over time. Her mouth has been hand pulled. Inner ear details and bow details have been satin stitched into place. She is mostly machine sewn but her head, tail, ears, bows, and scarves have been sewn on by hand. Since she has many hand sewn elements, she is not recommended for small children or rough play.
Handmade in Seattle Washington in a smoke free environment.
